page.title: 10HILLTOP FARM RAVENSDALE PARK
page.content: The children have cade lambs as pets There are 4 dogs, 1 foxhound & puppy 1 red setter & 1 Labrador, 10 cats. Have ponies & enjoy riding. The boy fishes in the brook. He has a small scramble bike which he uses to help his Father fetch the cows for milking Belong to swimming club in Ashbourne. The farm has several footpaths.Normal use of these causes no problems. Occasionally gates are left open let- ting animals stray onto roads.Parties of 20-30 walkers wearing brightly coloured anoraks & waving maps about disturb cows & frighten horses. Occasional hot air balloons disturb the animals with noise from burners. Sometimes land in the fields. Birds seen - snipe, owls, sparrowhawk heron, curlew, moorhen, Canada goose nests by brook.
